name: Graffiti City
description:
Graffiti City

Use your artistic abilities to deface public property! Don't let the man keep you down and spray your soul all over the city!

This is an early look at a game i'm developing. The idea is for it to turn into something akin to drawful where players can connect to a server on the computer or phones and do drawing mini games.

Right now all that's down is the basic drawing engine, I wanted to emulate the way drawful handles is but also add things i felt were missing in the original game such as a width slider or color picker.

For advanced drawers press D and A to rotate the canvas and draw in 3D!

Otherwise mouse controls work. Just click!
